Draven is confronted with this conundrum and seeing how much his wife is into decides to give in to absolute pleasure and experience the warm waters of bisexual passion once again. Charlie is in heaven with her two bi men as she gets lots of dicking and totally is getting off on helping the men enjoy each other. Dillon Diaz who just a year ago was as straight as a Kansas highway, with the guidance of his sexually uninhibited and gay loving wife Marilyn Johson he has turned into quite the bisexual, so when Jesse Stone arrives how can Dillon say no?
title: Bi For Now 2
